main event: Ground observers reported a UFO sighting near Kurodaha village in northeast India, where an unknown object hovered for about 5 minutes before accelerating and disappearing.
interesting points: The unknown object was first noticed about 100 ft above the ground, moving rapidly towards the north before hovering over the village., The object exhibited a stream of exhaust trailing behind it during its departure., Several ground observers reported similar sightings in quick succession., The object was not detected on radar and traveled from south to north., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes in total.
sighted object: unknown object hovering in the sky
